name: Minotaur
description: A Minotaur is a muscular humanoid with the head of a bull, known for its fierce demeanor and combat skills, often wielding heavy weapons.
memorable: Minotaurs possess the unique ability to recall any path they have traversed, making them exceptional hunters in labyrinths.
goals: Minotaurs typically hunt and engage intruders in their territory, often ambushing them in maze-like environments.
relations: Minotaurs may live within tribes that adhere to their own customs and social structures.
strengths: Incredible strength; adept at melee combat with powerful attacks.
weaknesses: Average Dexterity makes them less evasive and vulnerable to ranged attacks.
attacks: Utilizes a Greataxe for slashing damage and a Gore attack that can deal additional damage and knock targets prone.
most_powerful_ability: Labyrinthine Recall allows it to perfectly remember any paths it has traversed, granting strategic advantages in navigation.
senses: Notably high passive perception of 17, making it skilled at spotting hidden threats.
skills: Proficient in Perception, allowing it to identify hidden dangers effectively.
additional_information: Can increase damage output during a Bleeding Frenzy when low on hit points.
Has Reckless ability, allowing for advantage on melee attacks at a risk of being targeted easier.
Doubles damage to structures as a Siege Monster, making it destructive in hostile environments.
Capable of dealing extra damage if it charges before a Gore attack.
Resistance to exhaustion and fear, providing tactical advantages in chaotic encounters.
test_queries: powerful melee monster with bull head
aggressive beast skilled in ambush tactics
creature that remembers every path taken
massive creature known for charging attacks
